Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Room
  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to group all players who are playing on the same match. It's the main part of the controller and the one that communicates with the server to receive all the decisions the players take.

      static class  Room.TurnTimeoutException

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addPlayer​(java.lang.String color, java.lang.String playerName)
      Adds the player to the pendingPlayers list and removes their color from the availableColors list, while adding it to the playersColors list.
      private java.lang.String[][] calculateScore()
      This method is called when the match reaches an end and associates to every player a number indicative of the score they got by playing the game.
      private void checkAndSwap​(java.lang.String[][] scoreBoard, int i)

      Method called when the match is over.

      Calculates the kill shot Track associated with a specific player by confronting their color with color of all the drops present on the game board kill shot track.

      Creates a new turn timer using default values.
      private java.lang.String declareWinner()
      Calculates who's the winning player by finding the player with the maximum number of points

    • Field Detail

      • totRooms

        private static int totRooms

      • roomClosedEvent

        public final IEvent<Room,​java.lang.Integer> roomClosedEvent

      • timerStartEvent

        public final IEvent<Room,​java.lang.Integer> timerStartEvent
        Event that other classes can subscribe to. The event is invoked when the before match countdown starts.

      • timerTickEvent

        public final IEvent<Room,​java.lang.Integer> timerTickEvent
        Event that other classes can subscribe to. The event is invoked every PERIOD interval of time, after that the timer is started.

      • timerStopEvent

        public final IEvent<Room,​java.lang.Integer> timerStopEvent
        Event that other classes can subscribe to. The event is invoked if the before match countdown is already started and the number of connected players goes under 3.

      • newPlayerEvent

        public final IEvent<Room,​java.lang.String> newPlayerEvent
        Event that other classes can subscribe to. The event is invoked when a new player enters the room.

      • playerDisconnectedEvent

        public final IEvent<Room,​java.lang.String> playerDisconnectedEvent
        Event that other classes can subscribe to. The event is invoked when a player who's in the room disconnects.

      • reconnectedPlayerEvent

        public final IEvent<Room,​java.lang.String> reconnectedPlayerEvent
        Event other classes can subscribe to. This event is invoked when a player who was previously in the game reconnects to the server.

      • modelUpdatedEvent

        public final IEvent<Room,​Room.ModelEventArgs> modelUpdatedEvent
        Event other classes can subscribe to. Thi event is invoked when changes on the model occur, causing the server to update clients.

      • winnerEvent

        public final IEvent<Room,​java.lang.String> winnerEvent
        Event other classes can subscribe to. Thi event is invoked when the match this class is associated with reaches an end and a winner is declared.

      • scoreEvent

        public final IEvent<Room,​java.lang.String[][]> scoreEvent
        Event other classes can subscribe to. Thi event is invoked when the match this class is associated with reaches an end and the relative scoreboard is calculated

      • endMatchEvent

        public final IEvent<Room,​java.lang.Integer> endMatchEvent
        Event other classes can subscribe to. Thi event is invoked when the match this class is associated with reaches an end.

      • turnTimeoutEvent

        public final IEvent<Room,​java.lang.String> turnTimeoutEvent
        Event other classes can subscribe to. Thi event is invoked when the timer relative to a turn reaches 0 before the player can complete the turn.

      • loginTimer

        private final int loginTimer
        Integer representing the login timeout value

      • turnTimer

        private final int turnTimer
        Integer that represents the amount of seconds it takes for the turn timer to reach 0.

        private static final int PERIOD
        Integer representing the period value

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> pendingPlayers
        List of Strings, each of which represents the name of a player who's about to join the ready players list.

      • readyPlayers

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> readyPlayers
        List of Strings, each of which represents the name of a player who's joined the room and is set to start the game

      • suspendedPlayers

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> suspendedPlayers
        List of Strings, each of which represents the name of a player who's run out of time during his turn.

        private int gameLength
        Number of skulls relative to the match this room is managing

        private int gameSize
        Integer that represents the map type relative to the match the room is managing

        private Match match
        Match associated with this room

      • timer

        private RoomTimer timer
        Timer created by this class when the amount of ready players in the room is equal to the MIN_PLAYERS amount.

      • hostName

        private java.lang.String hostName
        Name of the player who logged into the room first. (Some of the match specifics are asked to the host).

      • matchStarting

        private boolean matchStarting
        Boolean representing whether the match is starting.

      • matchStarted

        private boolean matchStarted
        Boolean representing whether the match has started.

        Integer that represents the minimum number of players required for a match to start

        private int roomID

        private java.util.logging.Logger logger

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room​(int loginTimer,
            int turnTimer)
        Constructor that initializes the list referring to the available colors players can choose. It also starts the login timer.
        Parameters:
        loginTimer - timer used to as a reference to start the game when it reaches zero
        turnTimer - timer used to as a reference to end the turn when it reaches zero

    • Method Detail

      • setupEvents

        private void setupEvents()
        Subscribes to the endMatch event. When invoked, the room is closed and the server is notified.

      • isMatchStarted

        public boolean isMatchStarted()
        Returns the match state
        Returns:
        Whether the match has started or not.l

      • isTheMatchStarted

        public boolean isTheMatchStarted()

      • newLoginTimer

        private void newLoginTimer()
        Sets up the events relative to timeouts and players disconnecting.

      • onTimeout

        private void onTimeout()
        When the timeout event is invoked, this method checks whether there are enough players to start the game. In case there aren't, the timer is stopped; otherwise the matchStarting parameter is set to true and the match starts.

      • stopTimer

        private void stopTimer()
        This method is called when the match reaches a status where it is no longer ready to start. It puts the matchStarting variable equal to false and stops the timer. Also, the timerStop event is invoked.

      • onTurnTimeout

        private void onTurnTimeout()
        Method called when the turn timer reaches 0

      • onTurnTimeoutSync

        private void onTurnTimeoutSync()
        Method called when the turn timer reaches 0. It resets the timer and skips the turn.

      • setClientIdle

        public void setClientIdle​(java.lang.String name,
                          boolean isAlive)
                   throws Room.TurnTimeoutException
        Throws:
        Room.TurnTimeoutException

      • getTurnTimeout

        public boolean getTurnTimeout()

      • startMatch

        private void startMatch()
        Starts a match using the parameters chosen by the host and the parameters relative to the players already present in the room.

      • logMessage

        private void logMessage​(java.lang.String message)
        Method used to notify the server when a generic room adds a message to the log
        Parameters:
        message - String printed to the server

      • onNewActions

        private void onNewActions​(Player player,
                          java.util.List<Action> actions)

      • resetTurnTimer

        private void resetTurnTimer()

      • createTurnTimer

        private void createTurnTimer()
        Creates a new turn timer using default values. It also signs up to the timeout event relative to the newly created timer.

      • reconnect

        public void reconnect​(java.lang.String playerName)
        This method is called when a player reconnects to the room. Said player is removed from the disconnected list and the reconnectedPlayer event is invoked.
        Parameters:
        playerName - String that represents the name of the reconnected player

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer​(java.lang.String color,
                      java.lang.String playerName)
               throws Room.MatchStartingException,
                      Room.NotAvailableColorException
        Adds the player to the pendingPlayers list and removes their color from the availableColors list, while adding it to the playersColors list. Also, if the player is the first one to join the room, they are made host.
        Parameters:
        color - Color chosen by the added player
        playerName - Name chosen by the added player
        Throws:
        Room.MatchStartingException - This exception is thrown and handled when the match is starting or when the room has reached 5 Players when an other Player wants to join
        Room.NotAvailableColorException - This exception is thrown and handled when a requested color has been already taken

      • reconnectedPlayer

        public void reconnectedPlayer​(java.lang.String name)
        Removes the name of the reconnected player form the disconnectedPlayers list if the match is already started.
        Parameters:
        name - String that represents the name of the reconnected player.

      • isHost

        public boolean isHost​(java.lang.String name)
        Checks whether the name corresponds to the name of the room's host
        Parameters:
        name - Name that needs to be confronted with the name of the host
        Returns:
        True if the name is the same of the host's one, false otherwise.

      • newPlayer

        private void newPlayer​(java.lang.String name)
        Invokes the newPlayerEvent using that player's name as a parameter
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the new player who joined the room

      • getTotRooms

        private int getTotRooms()

      • incrementTotRooms

        private void incrementTotRooms()

      • getPlayerNames

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPlayerNames()
        Returns list with all names of the players in the room
        Returns:
        List with all names of the players in the room

      • removePlayer

        private void removePlayer​(java.lang.String name)
        The player with the same name as the one in the parameters is removed from the pendingPlayers and playerNames lists. Plus their color is added to the list of available colors and removed from the playerColors list.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the removed player

      • closeRoom

        private void closeRoom()
        Method called when the match is over. The room becomes unreachable and the roomClosed event is invoked

      • notifyPlayerReady

        public void notifyPlayerReady​(java.lang.String playerName)
        A new player is created using the name gotten as parameter and that player is removed from the pendingPlayers list, while added to the readyPlayers one. The readyCounter is incremented. If all the pending players have been removed from the list and the match is ready to start, then a new match is created. Otherwise, depending on the number of ready players either the timer is started (3 players) or the match is started (5 players)
        Parameters:
        playerName - Name of the player who's joined the room and is set up to start the game

      • getId

        public int getId()

      • notifyPlayerDisconnected

        public void notifyPlayerDisconnected​(java.lang.String name)
        If the match is not started yet, the player is removed from then room. Then the playerDisconnectedEvent is invoked, regardless of match starting or not.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the disconnected player

      • getAvailableColors

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAvailableColors()
                                                    throws Room.MatchStartingException
        Returns a list of available colors from which the player can choose. This method is synchronized in order to avoid the bad case scenario where to players on the same room are choosing a color.
        Returns:
        A list of available colors
        Throws:
        Room.MatchStartingException - This exception is thrown and handled when the match is starting or when the room has reached 5 Players when an other Player wants to join

      • getDisconnectedPlayers

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDisconnectedPlayers()

      • getOtherPlayers

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOtherPlayers​(java.lang.String player)
        Given a player name, this method returns the list of all the players currently playing except the one gotten as input.
        Parameters:
        player - Name of the player to be excluded from the returned list
        Returns:
        List of strings representing the names of all players except the one in the input parameters

      • getPlayerColor

        public PlayerColor getPlayerColor​(java.lang.String name)

      • isJoinable

        public boolean isJoinable()

      • setGameLength

        public void setGameLength​(int gameLength)
        The number of skulls is set based on host's decision
        Parameters:
        gameLength - Number of skulls the match is going to be made of

      • setGameSize

        public void setGameSize​(int gameSize)
        The map type is set based on host's decision
        Parameters:
        gameSize - Map type the match is going to be played on.

      • calculateScore

        private java.lang.String[][] calculateScore()
        This method is called when the match reaches an end and associates to every player a number indicative of the score they got by playing the game. Then it creates a leader board based on the amount of points that every player has acquired.
        Returns:
        The leader board that represents the final ladder based on player points.

      • checkAndSwap

        private void checkAndSwap​(java.lang.String[][] scoreBoard,
                          int i)

      • declareWinner

        private java.lang.String declareWinner()
        Calculates who's the winning player by finding the player with the maximum number of points
        Returns:
        Winning player's name

      • countKillShotTrack

        private int countKillShotTrack​(Player player)
        Calculates the kill shot Track associated with a specific player by confronting their color with color of all the drops present on the game board kill shot track.
        Parameters:
        player - Player whose kill shot Track is going to be calculated.
        Returns:
        The kill shot Track associated with the player.

      • onMatchEnd

        private void onMatchEnd()
        This method is called when the match reaches an end. It calculates both the winner and the scoreboard and then invokes the 3 events relative to the end of a match.

      • getCurModel

        public Room.ModelEventArgs getCurModel​(java.lang.String name)
